message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll be selling to John for $15,000.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am still not able to meet at $11,000. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
